title: Riding The Edge
description: Simple man. Simple values. Either you love me, or you hate me. But if you're one who needs me, you've always got me. That is, until you betray me. Secrets and lies are the cancer of the soul. But they brought me to her. Strong as hell and fearless too, she's never needed anyone for anything.Until now.Jaded and terrified, we're in this thing together. Because I ain't afraid to ride the edge of misery. And I intend to prove to her that there's something beautiful on the other side.
author: Janine Infante Bosco
